questions.question: What is the dominant color scheme of the presented nutritional information panel, considering both text and background?

What is the typeface or font style predominantly used for the textual content on the nutritional facts panel?
Based on the visual structure, what is the primary unit of measurement used to express the quantities of nutrients?
Observing the panel, what language(s) is/are employed to describe the nutritional components and their respective values?
Describe the visual texture of the background area of the presented nutritional information panel.
Considering the layout of the data, how many columns are visibly used to organize the nutritional information?
What is the visual weight or prominence given to the column headers in comparison to the numerical values?
What is the visual alignment used for the numerical data within each column of the nutritional facts panel?
Describe the visual style of the border around the nutritional information panel, if any is present.
What is the overall visual style of the nutritional information panel?
Describe the visual contrast between the text and background elements of the nutritional facts panel.
Is there any visual ornamentation or decorative element used in the design of the nutritional panel?

Based purely on visual cues, what is the approximate size of the provided nutritional information panel relative to a standard sheet of paper?
